title: "More Medical Device Deaths Than We Previously Thought?"
excerpt: "A significant number of medical device adverse events that resulted in patient deaths were miscategorized in the FDA's Manufacturer and User Facility Device Experience (MAUDE) database, according to an analysis using a natural language processing algorithm."
